snippet: The agreement on banking supervision would put between 100 and 200 major banks under the direct oversight of the European Central Bank.
abstract: European leaders gathering in Brussels for year-end summit meeting hail agreement to place euro zone banks under direct supervision of European Central Bank, calling it concrete measure to maintain viability of currency as well as step in laying groundwork for broader economic union.

byline.contributor: Niki Kitsantonis contributed reporting from Athens.

lead_paragraph: The agreement on banking supervision would put between 100 and 200 major banks under the direct oversight of the European Central Bank.

headline.main: European Leaders Hail Accord on Banking Supervision
headline.print_headline: European Leaders Hail Unified Bank Oversight
